question: Given, a current carrying wire of non-uniform cross-section, which of the following is constant throughout the length of wire?
choices: Current, electric field and drift speed
explanation: In a series circuit (the wire), charge is conserved, so Current (I) is constant.
Drift speed <katex>$v_d = I / (nAe)$</katex> depends on Area.
Electric field <katex>$E = J/\sigma$</katex> depends on Area.
